programme.title: El señor de los bosques T4
programme.desc: Ocio y Aficiones,Naturaleza | 2021 | TP | *6/10 · Programa de entretenimiento y divulgación de todo aquello que nos ofrecen los bosques, haciendo énfasis en otoño al mundo de las setas, con paseos por bosques en compañía de personajes conocidos. · País: España · Presenta: César Palacios, Vicente Sevilla, Diego Ferrer. · Productora: Radio Televisión Española (RTVE), Zona Mixta.

programme.title: De parque en parque

programme.title: ¡Qué animal! T4
programme.desc: Ocio y Aficiones,Naturaleza | 2019 | TP | *6/10 · Espacio conducido por Evelyn Segura en el que se descubren los secretos de la fauna y la flora de España. programme.title: Turismo rural en el mundo

programme.title: Wild México

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: New Albany, Mississippi
programme.desc: When a beloved member of a tight-knit community is killed, the town cries out for immediate justice; after a young man is sentenced to death for the crime, and an out-of-town lawyer argues they convicted an innocent man.

programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: Prichard, Alabama

programme.sub-title: It Couldn't Happen Here: Aledo, Texas

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Navajo Tribal Policeman Joe Leaphorn must solve a series of crimes; he partners with new deputy, Jim Chee, who is back on the reservation for the first time since he was a child; together they face down evil forces, both earthly and supernatural.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn and Chee interview the surviving witness to the Big Rock Motel murders; Chee meets with the coroner; the cause of death remains a mystery; Sgt. Manuelito makes a chilling discovery of her own.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn's niece celebrates her Kinaaldá as Leaphorn retrieves the bodies of the murder victims; Manuelito and Chee investigate the whereabouts of the missing Mormon family.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn suspects all of the crimes on the reservation are related; there is a big break in the case; Leaphorn invites Chee over for dinner; Manuelito makes a discovery of her own.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: With a major suspect in custody, Leaphorn discovers that there is more to this crime than he would have ever imagined; Manuelito faces her worst fears; Chee must make a choice between his career and his people.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn, Chee and Manuelito descend on the hiding place of the Buffalo Society, only to be confronted with hard decisions that could change the outcome of the rest of their lives.

programme.title: Paco Gento

programme.title: Hugo Sanchez
programme.desc: Hugo Sanchez to symbol Realu Madryt drugiej połowy lat 80. Meksykanin był niezwykle skutecznym zawodnikiem - w sezonie 1989/1990 strzelił 38 goli i został najlepszym strzelcem Europy.

programme.title: Javier Irureta
programme.desc: Widzowie poznają biografię Javiera Iruretay, piłkarza Atletico Madryt i Athleticu Bilbao. Jako zawodnik Bask święcił triumfy w barwach Rojiblancos, zdobywając dwukrotnie mistrzostwo Hiszpanii.
